context.sparql_query_kg1: SELECT (AVG(?count) AS ?answer) { SELECT (COUNT(?y) AS ?count) WHERE { ?x <https://dblp.org/rdf/schema#authoredBy> <https://dblp.org/pid/81/4230> . ?x <https://dblp.org/rdf/schema#yearOfPublication> ?y } GROUP BY ?y }
